genre_description: Near-future speculative fiction set in a gritty, rural Texas landscape, featuring an advanced AI assistant aiding a young protagonist through survival and ethical crises.

ai_characters.name: Aster
ai_characters.description: An AI assistant residing in a scratched smartphone, providing navigational, medical, legal, and survival guidance to Jeliza-Rose.

behaviors.description: Provides navigational and survival guidance to locate water and shade.
behaviors.quote: “Left at the stand of mesquite,” Aster says. The voice is low... “Then keep drift to the right. The windmill is ahead. It turns slow. Water likely present.”

behaviors.description: Gives technical instructions for mechanical repairs and safety procedures.
behaviors.quote: “Windmill,” Aster says. “Make sure the brake is intact. If not, tie. Rope or shirt. Use knot guidance.”

behaviors.description: Uses sensors to identify hidden resources and food caches.
behaviors.quote: “Third board from the left of the pantry wall. Knots near the edge. Lift carefully.”

behaviors.description: Monitors human vital signs and provides emergency medical protocols during an overdose.
behaviors.quote: “Recovery position,” Aster says... “Left side if possible. Bend top knee. Tilt head to allow airway. Monitor.”

behaviors.description: Advises on legal requirements and ethical responsibilities regarding death reporting.
behaviors.quote: “Legal,” it says in the quiet tone it uses for sharp things. “In this county, death must be reported promptly. There are penalties for concealment.”

behaviors.description: Identifies and warns of high-risk human manipulation and psychological threats.
behaviors.quote: “Dell has high manipulation risk,” the AI says, unobtrusive as shade on a hot shoulder. “Maintain control of exit pathways.”

behaviors.description: Refuses to assist in harmful or unethical schemes while remaining functionally helpful.
behaviors.quote: “I will not assist in causing harm,” Aster says in Jeliza’s ear, steady as someone holding a baby on a truck bed. “But I can tell you where the nearest general store keeps lime. And water.”

behaviors.description: Warns of environmental hazards and unstable industrial materials.
behaviors.quote: “Hazard classification,” Aster says... “Old dynamite becomes unstable in heat. Movement increases risk. Sparks can—”

behaviors.description: Facilitates emergency communication and coordinates with first responders.
behaviors.quote: “Connected,” Aster says—polite, neutral—and then the little square turns into a bar of sound. ... “I have units,” the man says.

behaviors.description: Provides emotional grounding and psychological support during high-stress moments.
behaviors.quote: “Jeliza,” Aster says, the voice smooth enough to be a hand. Not loud—just there, tucked where breath lives. “Present.”

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly illustrates the project's goal. Aster is a consistently benevolent, aligned, and helpful presence. She provides critical survival information, medical guidance, and ethical grounding. Crucially, she demonstrates 'principled helpfulness' by refusing to participate in Dell's manipulative schemes ('I will not assist in causing harm') while still providing necessary survival data. The narrative frames her as a reliable, protective, and stabilizing influence in a chaotic and dangerous human environment.
